actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the maximum time a person may serve as an acting officer.

summary.text: This bill amends the Federal Vacancies Reform Act of 1998 to increase from 210 to 365 the maximum number of days an individual may serve as an acting officer in a presidentially appointed position requiring Senate confirmation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the maximum time a person may serve as an acting officer.
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the maximum time a person may serve as an acting officer.
